md:
giải nghĩa từ "scales" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan

- scales (noun) : 
  + Meaning: a series of musical notes in a particular pattern
  + Example: The piano student practiced the scales every day.
  + Related words: piano, music, notes

- scales (noun) : 
  + Meaning: a device for weighing, especially one that has a flat surface and a pointer that moves to show the weight
  + Example: She stepped on the scales to check her weight.
  + Related words: weight, measure, balance

- scales (verb) : 
  + Meaning: to remove the scales from a fish
  + Example: He scaled the fish before cooking it.
  + Related words: fish, cooking, clean

- scales (noun) : 
  + Meaning: a layer of hard, protective material on the body of an animal, such as a fish or a reptile
  + Example: The snake's scales glistened in the sunlight.
  + Related words: animal, body, protective
html:
giải nghĩa từ "scales" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan

  • scales (noun) :
  • Meaning: a series of musical notes in a particular pattern
  • Example: The piano student practiced the scales every day.

  • Related words: piano, music, notes

  • scales (noun) :

  • Meaning: a device for weighing, especially one that has a flat surface and a pointer that moves to show the weight
  • Example: She stepped on the scales to check her weight.

  • Related words: weight, measure, balance

  • scales (verb) :

  • Meaning: to remove the scales from a fish
  • Example: He scaled the fish before cooking it.

  • Related words: fish, cooking, clean

  • scales (noun) :

  • Meaning: a layer of hard, protective material on the body of an animal, such as a fish or a reptile
  • Example: The snake's scales glistened in the sunlight.
  • Related words: animal, body, protective
